channel.title: AI-Pulse - Stock Market & Finance
channel.description: Stock Market & Finance news from AI-Pulse

item.title: Freedom Capital Markets downgrades Fortinet stock rating on valuation
item.description: Freedom Capital Markets downgrades Fortinet stock rating on valuation

item.title: Here are some attractive stocks that can withstand AI disruption, according to J.P. Morgan
item.description: CrowdStrike, C.H. Robinson and Compass are among stocks that have been unfairly punished by fears of AI disruption, analysts say.

item.title: Berkshire returns to the newspaper business, takes bigger bite of Domino’s Pizza
item.description: Berkshire’s fresh bet on the publisher of the New York Times marks a return to newspapers for the conglomerate after exiting the business six years ago.

item.title: Infosys joins forces with the AI company that triggered a sharp selloff in its stock
item.description: Infosys shares looked set to rally after collaboration with Anthropic, just after the AI company had helped trigger a sharp selloff in the IT-consultant sector.

item.title: Rivian’s stock just had its best day ever — and now this analyst says to sell
item.description: D.A. Davidson worries that Rivian’s guidance would require the company to see an unusually strong debut of its R2 EV.

item.title: Palantir joins the wave of businesses and billionaires moving to Florida
item.description: Some experts say Florida’s more business-friendly policies are helping the state attract more corporations.
